title: FENO HOBY RE NY LANITRA

verses.1:
He! Ny fifaliana ao an-danitra,
Tonga ity ny very fahizay
Ka ny Rainy faly sy finaritra
Mba handray ny zanany indray.
verses.2:
He! Ny fifaliana ao an-danitra
Fa ilay very dia hita izao
Voaray ho zanak'Andriamanitra
Efa tonga olona vaovao
verses.3:
He! Ny fifaliana ao an-danitra,
Mahabe ny haravoanay,
Mba ankalazao Andriamanitra,
Fa ny maty velona indray.

chorus:
Feno hoby re ny lanitra
Ka derao Andriamanitra
Eny, mihobia re ry mino Ã´!
Ka hirao ny fihiram-baovao
